content: we recently went on a norwegian cruise ship apparently it is a thing to hide and find little ducks on the ship my 5 year old granddaughter was understandably excited about this i decided to knit some and ended up with about 20 to hide i couldn t find a pattern that had everything i liked so worked out my own here it is p s the adults on the ship seemed more excited about finding knitted ducks than the kids did this probably isn t a great beginner pattern as it has some techniques a beginner might not know - judy s magic cast on working in the round wrap and turns closing with kitchener and picking up stitches but it s a very quick little knit and i had fun making the little ducks for dk yarn and 3 0 mm needle about 4-5 grams of yarn needed if you use worsted and 3 5 mm needle about 7 grams needed
